pages.text: $(li)Nether Bricks can be used to craft $(l)Nether Brick Fences$(), $(l)Nether Brick Fence Gates$(), $(l)Nether Bricks$(), $(l)Red Nether Bricks$(), $(l)Blue Nether Bricks$() and the $(l:patchouli:weapons/blood_sprayer)Blood Sprayer$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can throw them to other creatures right clicking while you have a Nether Brick in your hand.

$(li)They will inflict half of heart of damage and will push them away too.$(br)$(li)You can obtain Bricks smelting Netherrack in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/kiln)Kiln$(/l).$(br)$(li)Their throw range is the lowest compared to the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/brick)Brick$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/environmental/mud_brick)Mud Brick$(/l).
